    Author:
    University of Mannheim

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean changed  
      private int clock
      Simulation time.
      private int copiedIndexOffset  
      private int copiedIndexOffsetAtCreation
      Indicates the value of the copiedIndexOffset that the parent instance of this instance had at the point of creation of this instance.
      private double currentEnergyCost
      Energy costs that come from the current point in simulation time.
      private double currentHVACPower
      Current HVAC system power consumption .
      private double currentITPower
      Current IT power consumption of the DC:
      private DREventHandler drEventHandler
      DREventHandler component of the DC.
      private EventHandler eventHandler
      EventHanlder component of the DC.
      private EventQueue eventQueue
      EventQueue of the DC:
      private java.util.ArrayList<BatchJob> finishedJobs
      List of all jobs that are already finished.
      private int historicOverallECOffset
      Indicates the point in simulation time at which this DC instance was created.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> historicOverallPC
      List of total facility power consumption at past points in simulation time.
      private HVAC hvac
      HVAC system of the DC:
      private int id
      Unique ID of the DC:
      private boolean isCopy
      Indicates whether this instance was generated by the deepCopy()-method of another DC instance.
      private int lastCopiedIndex
      Indicates to which index in the unsubmittedParsedJobs list, a DC instance has copied the jobs from the original instance.
      private int lastUnsubmittedJobRequestDate
      Indicates the latest submission time of all unsubmitted jobs that were copied to this copied instance.
      private java.lang.String name
      Name of the DC.
      private int nextSchedulerCall
      Point in simulation time at which the next call of the scheduler component is supposed to happen.
      private double occupiedServerPC
      Current power consumption off all occupied servers.
      private double occupiedServerUtil
      Current utilization of all occupied servers.
      private int overallCurrentPC
      Total facility power consumption of the DC:
      private double overallCurrentServerUtil
      Current utilization off all servers in the DC.
      private DC parent
      If this instance is a copy, this indicates the DC instance from which this instance was copied.
      private double pue
      Static PUE of the DC (not used as now a dynamic PUE trace is used).
      private Scheduler scheduler
      Scheduler component of the DC.
      private int schedulingInterval
      Length of the scheduling interval in simulation time.
      private DemandFlexibilitySchedulingStrategy schedulingStrategy
      Scheduling strategy that is used to schedule DR events.
      private java.util.List<Server> server
      List of all servers in the DC.
      private java.util.Calendar simStartTime
      Start date of the simulation.
      private java.util.ArrayList<BatchJob> unsubmittedParsedJobs
      List of all jobs that were parsed from the workload trace, but are not yet submitted to the scheduler component.
      private java.util.List<ESF> ups
      List of all ESF devices of the DC.

      void scheduleJobsForMaximumPowerDemand​(int DRIntervalLength)
      Schedules an interval of the specified length so that the maximum power demand is reached.
      void scheduleJobsForMaximumPowerDemandDVFSOnly​(int DRIntervalLength)
      Schedules an interval of the specified length so that the maximum power demand, which can be achieved through frequency scaling, is reached.
      void scheduleJobsForMaximumPowerDemandShiftingOnly​(int DRIntervalLength)
      Schedules an interval of the specified length so that the maximum power demand, which can be achieved through workload shifting, is reached.

      Schedules an interval of the specified length so that the minimum power demand is reached.

        List of total facility power consumption at past points in simulation time.

      • historicOverallECOffset

        private int historicOverallECOffset
        Indicates the point in simulation time at which this DC instance was created. Used to calculate energy costs.

        Current power consumption off all occupied servers.

        private java.util.ArrayList<BatchJob> unsubmittedParsedJobs
        List of all jobs that were parsed from the workload trace, but are not yet submitted to the scheduler component.

        private java.util.ArrayList<BatchJob> finishedJobs
        List of all jobs that are already finished.

      • copiedIndexOffset

        private int copiedIndexOffset

      • parent

        private DC parent
        If this instance is a copy, this indicates the DC instance from which this instance was copied.

      • lastUnsubmittedJobRequestDate

        private int lastUnsubmittedJobRequestDate
        Indicates the latest submission time of all unsubmitted jobs that were copied to this copied instance.

      • lastCopiedIndex

        private int lastCopiedIndex
        Indicates to which index in the unsubmittedParsedJobs list, a DC instance has copied the jobs from the original instance. Therefore, only exists and is used for copied instances.

      • copiedIndexOffsetAtCreation

        private int copiedIndexOffsetAtCreation
        Indicates the value of the copiedIndexOffset that the parent instance of this instance had at the point of creation of this instance.

    • Method Detail

      • deepCopy

        public DC deepCopy​(int lastSubmissionDateOfCopiedUnsubmittedJobs)
        Provides a deep copy of this DC instance.
        Parameters:
        lastSubmissionDateOfCopiedUnsubmittedJobs - Point in simulation time that indicates to which submission time, the jobs from the original DC instance are copied to the newly created instance.
        Returns:
        Deep copy object of this DC object.

      • scheduleJobs

        public void scheduleJobs​()
        Schedules the jobs for the upcoming scheduling interval. Thereby, the method checks whether the current value of the clock variable of the DC equals the value of the nextSchedulerCall variable of the DC. When this is not the case, the scheduler component of the DC is not called.

      • updateJobAllocation

        public void updateJobAllocation​(boolean updateRemainingJobTimes,
                                boolean increaseClock)
        Updates the allocation of the jobs to the servers in the DC.
        Parameters:
        updateRemainingJobTimes - Indicates whether one timesteps of simulation time should be elapsed for the relevant jobs.
        increaseClock - Indicates whether the clock of the DC should be increased during the call of the method.

      • scheduleJobsForMaximumPowerDemand

        public void scheduleJobsForMaximumPowerDemand​(int DRIntervalLength)
        Schedules an interval of the specified length so that the maximum power demand is reached.
        Parameters:
        DRIntervalLength - Length of the interval to schedule.

      • scheduleJobsForMinimumPowerDemand

        public void scheduleJobsForMinimumPowerDemand​(int DRIntervalLength)
        Schedules an interval of the specified length so that the minimum power demand is reached.
        Parameters:
        DRIntervalLength - Length of the interval to schedule.

      • scheduleJobsForMaximumPowerDemandShiftingOnly

        public void scheduleJobsForMaximumPowerDemandShiftingOnly​(int DRIntervalLength)
        Schedules an interval of the specified length so that the maximum power demand, which can be achieved through workload shifting, is reached.
        Parameters:
        DRIntervalLength - Length of the interval to schedule.

      • scheduleJobsForMaximumPowerDemandDVFSOnly

        public void scheduleJobsForMaximumPowerDemandDVFSOnly​(int DRIntervalLength)
        Schedules an interval of the specified length so that the maximum power demand, which can be achieved through frequency scaling, is reached.
        Parameters:
        DRIntervalLength - Length of the interval to schedule.

      • scheduleJobsForMinimumPowerDemandShiftingOnly

        public void scheduleJobsForMinimumPowerDemandShiftingOnly​(int DRIntervalLength)

        DRIntervalLength - Length of the interval to schedule.

        Parameters:

      • addServer

        public boolean addServer​(Server server)
        Add a server instance to the DC.
        Parameters:
        server - Server that should be added.
        Returns:
        Indicates whether the server was added successfully.

      • addESF

        public boolean addESF​(ESF esf)
        Add ESF device to the DC.
        Parameters:
        esf - ESF device that should be added.
        Returns:
        True when the ESF device was added successfully, otherwise false.

      • addUnsubmittedParsedJob

        public boolean addUnsubmittedParsedJob​(BatchJob job)
        Adds a job to the list of unsubmitted parsed jobs.
        Parameters:
        job - Job that should be added to the list.
        Returns:
        True when the jobs was added successfully, false otherwise.

      • submitParsedJob

        public void submitParsedJob​(BatchJob job)
        Submits a job from the list of unsubmitted parsed jobs to the submitted jobs list of the scheduler component of the DC. Thereby, the equals method of the Object class is used to identify the job in the list of unsubmitted parsed jobs. Thus, the instance that is passed as parameter has to be the same as the instance that is contained in the list of unsubmitted parsed jobs.
        Parameters:
        job - Job that should be submitted to the scheduler component.

      • submitAffectedSubmittedJob

        public void submitAffectedSubmittedJob​(BatchJob job)
        Submits a job from the list of unsubmitted parsed jobs to the affected submitted jobs list of the scheduler component of the DC. Thereby, the equals method of the Object class is used to identify the job in the list of unsubmitted parsed jobs. Thus, the instance that is passed as parameter has to be the same as the instance that is contained in the list of unsubmitted parsed jobs.
        Parameters:
        job - Job that should be submitted to the scheduler component.

      • setupDC

        public void setupDC​()
        Recalculates the power consumption values of the DC.

      • getCostsInSpecifiedInterval

        public double getCostsInSpecifiedInterval​(int intervalStart,
                                          int intervalEnd)
        Retrieves the DC costs (SLA and energy) within the specified interval.
        Parameters:
        intervalStart - Start date of the interval for which the costs should be calculated.
        intervalEnd - End date of the interval for which the costs should be calculated.
        Returns:
        Total DC costs from the specified interval.

      • removeKey

        public void removeKey​()
        Removes a timestep from the EventQueue of the DC. This should be used to avoid that the size of the EventQueue grows too large during long simulations.

      • initEventHandlerLists

        public void initEventHandlerLists​()
        Initializes the server lists in the EventHandler component of the DC.

      • getJobSubmissionEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> getJobSubmissionEvents​(int timestamp)
        Retrieves all job submission events that are scheduled at a specified point in simulation time.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - Point in simulation time for which the events are requested.
        Returns:
        A list of all job submission events that are scheduled at the specified point in simulation time.

        private void addAdditionalUnsubmittedJobs​(int newEndDate)
